add_selective_outside: Add Selective people from outside institution
alumni_select_class: Select the last class that you were attending for the academic year selected above.
approve_message: Your prize money will be transferred to your given account details, once the Tricycle team completes its validation.
archive_room_des: Tricycle does not delete a group completely . The content is restrained and maybe searched for at anytime in the futue
block_content: Blocked users won’t find you, your profile, postings, timelines, and anything related to you. Tricycle does not inform that you have blocked them.
block_user_des: Blocked users won’t find you, your profile, postings, timelines, and anything related to you. Tricycle does not inform that you have blocked them.
blocked_user_des: Following users are blocked by you. They will not be able to see you in their search results as well as any content posted by you will not be visible to them.
cannot_exit_room: You would not be able to exit without making another member as the room admin
classroom_des: Classrooms are used to create groups consisting of Staffs & students of the same institution only. A classroom can be used to create groups for class, subject, club, sports and for anything where Only staffs & students are going to be part. In this room type, parents can neither create nor be part.
communityroom_des: The community room can be used to create rooms where Parents teachers & students need to be there. It can be used even when a group wants to invite members from outside the institution. Outsiders can be teachers, students, parents, alumni of any institution. Any user of Tricycle can be a member of the community room. Use it for public forum discussions.
complete_your_profile: Complete your Profile & earn 10,000 tricycle coins
copy_web_link: Copy the web link of the source of the news
copyright_des: Not copying the respective source of the link of the original is considered a copyright violation. Tricycle will not appreciate such violation and such news articles will be taken down.
dep_alumni: Select the department that you have attended.
dep_parent: Select the department that your child is attending for the academic year mentioned above.
dep_quote: Select the department that You are attending for the academic year mentioned above.
dep_teacher: Select the department that you are teaching for the academic year mentioned above.
detail_of_staff: Detail of the staff who will manage institution
dob_child: Please select date of birth of your child
domain: A user registering as a student or staff of your institution shall be validated & authorised without any intervention, in case the given email ID contains the domain name mentioned here. Please enter the right domain name of your emailID provided for your students and staff. Click next if you don't have a domain
either_student_teacher: You need to be either a teacher or student with an institution or government-issued ID Card.
end_date: End date should be greater than start date
ensure_details: Ensure your given details are correct to you receive your prize money.
enterStudentCodeofChild: Enter student code of your child, below
exit_app: Are you sure you want to exit Tricycle?
from_where_picture: From where do you want to take your profile picture?
get_institute_registered: Enter to get your institute registered with Tricycle
if_no_inst_found: Your institute is not yet registered. You may please register the institute or request us to call back.
input_phone: Input the phone number to launch
inst1: In the next steps, you will have to upload the logo as well as your staff/student/Gov Photo ID. Please have the images with you.
inst2: I verify that I’m one of the current student or a staff member of this institute, and I am accessible to the institute administrators or Tricycle officials if necessary.
inst_students:
1. Your Email ID is not been provided by the school 
 
 2. You shall provide your class ID or student ID provided to you by your school. 
 
 3. Sometimes this may need approval from the school.  
 
 4. Before approval, you may be able to use many functions, but not those that are specific to your classes.
institute_confirm_des: Your prize money will be paid on your UPI or based on your mobile number through digital transfers.
institute_image_upload_content: Please upload the logo of your institution. In case your institution do not have a logo, please press next
institute_reg_des:
Currently, your institution is not registered with Tricycle. Registration will help you know more about your institution as well as the other members of your institution network. 

 You will have to make one of the staff to register the institution and update the details.
invite_friends: Invite your Friends & earn 5,000 tricycle coins, each.
invite_member_des: Users invited through Share a link will have to join Either your institution network or another institution network to join your room
invite_parents: Invite your parents & earn 5,000 tricycle coins, each.
invite_students: Invite your students & earn 5,000 tricycle coins, each.
istructionsParentStudent:
1. You should know your child’s student ID to be part of the institution. 
 
2. You will be asked one or more questions about your child to ensure authenticity. 
 
3. Please ensure you have the right details with you.
login_username_empty: Please enter a valid user name
news_agree_1: I understand that I can not violate any of the copyrights. I assure Tricycle, that I have either not copied any news or mentioned the link of the News article from where the gist of the news was taken. I understand in case if the news is Considered or reported as copyright violation, Tricycle will take down the news.
news_agree_2: I understand that I cannot post any news which Is factually incorrect
news_other_des: In case you are writing a news article based on other media sources, then it is necessary for you to copy the link of the website.
no_email_provided: Your registered Email ID is not registered with the school. So please enter your class code or student ID.
no_institutions: Is your institution not part of Tricycle yet? Request a callback below & we'll help you to join the Tricycle network.
no_internet: No internet connection, Please check your connection!!
non_verified_person: You can access your institution network once they approve you.
not_approve_user: You cannot approve this user as one or more details given by you is Incorrect
not_knowing_user: You do not seem to be knowing the user
old_new_student: Are you a current or old student?
only_verirfied: Only users verified by their institution can create rooms
otp_des:
'Enter a 6 digit number that was sent to 
 $email & $mobileNo 
or
Click on the link in your email',
parent_child_select_class: Select the class that your child is attending for the academic year mentioned above.
parent_intro_desc: Prosocial behaviour is strengthened in children whose parents actively participate in educational programs
parent_intro_subtitle: Parent participation is the key differentiator
parent_search_child: You can select only after your child has registered him/herself. Please search above the name of your child. In case if you find more than one similar name, please select the correct child. In case you have more than one child, you can update those details after finishing this setup.
parentsroom_des: Parentroom allows parents or staff to form a group of parents along with the staff. Only parents and staff within the same institution can be members.
password_not_matching: The two passwords do not match!
please_enter_otp:
Please enter the OTP sent
on your registered phone number.
poll_ins1: A poll can run for upto 15 days only.
poll_ins2: We do not allow polls on, political, obscene, individuals, or any sensitive topics. We shall block such polls.
primary_role: Select the primary role that you are responsible at
privateswitch_des: When the room is private, it will not be visible in any search & members can join only through invite links.
program_quote: Select the right academic  year above, before selecting programs that you are studying
program_quote_alumni: Select the right academic year above, before selecting the program that you have attended.
program_quote_parent: Select the right academic  year above, before selecting programs that your child is attending.
program_quote_teacher: Select the right academic  year above, before selecting programs that you are teaching
publicswitch_des: When the room is public, the relevant users can search and join a particular room. For example, all students and teachers of the same institution can find all public classrooms through search & join.
reg_step1_des: Fill the form with the details of the staff who will register and administer your institution.
reg_step2_des: Login through web https://www.tricycle.life and click on Manage institution.
regis_requirement:
1. You will be made, as the first moderator of your institution. 
2. You can assign other admins later.
3. Please ensure that your institution is not registered with Tricycle already.
4. Since similar names are possible in many institutions, name-based duplicity validation is not done by Tricycle.
5. A new institution can be registered only by current staff or students.
6. You could earn up to 1000Rs to get your institution registered.
7. Registering an institution may take little a longer time than a user registration.
8.You need to be either a teacher or student with an institution or government-issued ID Card.
9. If your institution is already registered and your registration is found to be duplicitous, Tricycle does not validate your registration.
register_message: You are a few more steps away to be part of the best Social Learning Network
remove_content: When you remove users from your followers' list they won’t be getting regular updates from you. They still can refollow you. Tricycle does Not inform that you have removed them. But you will not be on the users Following list.
remove_user_des: When you remove users from your followers' list they Won’t be getting regular updates From you. They still can refollow you. Tricycle does Not inform that you have removed them. But you will not be on the users' following list.
report_abuse_des: As per our policy, we shall look into your report, and may share the content with the concerned institution. However, we may not take an action, in the event the content is not in violation as reported by you. We do not respond to abuse reports.
room_des: When a room is set to private it can only be viewed & joined through invitation
scratch_here: Scratch here to get your prize money
sec_quote: Select the section for the above-mentioned class
sec_quote_teacher: Select one or more sections that you are teaching for the above-selected class. In case you are teaching more than one class, the class above will change one by one after you click the next button.
select_both_c_s: Please select both classes and subjects
select_class_student: Select the class that you are attending for the academic year mentioned above.
select_right_institute: Please select the right institute where you are either staff, student, alumni, or parent. Institutes with the same name are highly possible. Check the location detail before choosing.
select_student_text: Please select whether you are a current student or old student (Alumni)
selectChildInstruction: You can select your child if he/she has already registered. Please skip this step, in case your child is not registered. In case you have more than one child, you can update those details after finishing this setup.
server_error: There has been a server Error
set_role: You can add more than one role that you play. For Example, you could be a teacher as well as a parent.
share_detail_outside: Your details will not be shared with any outsiders. Your privacy is secured and safe.
share_through_other: Share through other social media networks(ex. Whatsapp)
sharing_a_room: Sharing a room lets you to collaborate with other institutions
staff_des:
Note: If the staff is using an email ID of the institution, they will be able to manage institution without any more permission.

 In case if the institution does not have its own Email domain, we shall validate the staff, through our internal process before the staff can manage
staff_registered: Staff should be registered with Tricycle before able to be listed here. If you are the staff, please enter your name.
staffroom_des: Staffrooms are to be used when only staff members of the same institution are wanting to have a group. Students and parents cannot be part of this room type.
student_id_required: Enter staff or student Enrolment ID., or Gov. ID
student_intro_desc: With the right feedback mechanism, a teacher-student relationship enhances the optimism of children
student_intro_subtitle: A students' network helps them develop faster
student_subj_inf: Select the subjects that you are learning. You can update past details after setting up.
studentidofchild: Enter student Id of your child*
subject: Subject
sure_goal: Are you sure you want mark this goal as achieved ?
teacher_classes_info: Select the classes that you are teaching for the academic year mentioned above.
teacher_inst:
1. In case you did not receive a code from your institution, you may continue with setup by clicking on “Do not have a code?” 
 
  2. However, your profile will be activated only after it is approved by the institution. 
 
 3. You may send a WhatsApp reminder to your institution at the end of the setup.
teacher_intro_desc: Parents & students can interact with teachers' directly
teacher_intro_subtitle: Teachers are the source of enormous knowledge
teacher_no_email: Your Email ID is not registered with the school. So please enter your code provided by your institution.
teacher_sub_info: Select the subjects that you are teaching. You can update past details after setting up.
thank_u_filling_details: Thank you for filling the details. We will get back to you soon.
tips_to_answer:
Tips to get good answers. 
1. Tricycle is meant for education & learning, don’t ask irrelevant questions 
2. Avoid asking questions that are already asked 
3. Keep your questions short and simple. 
4. Check for spelling & grammar mistakes. 
5. Use #tags to refer topics & interests 
6. Use @ to tag users 
7. Use [] to tag rooms
tricycle_moto:
Tricycle helps schools & educational institutions facilitate one space, to network & collaborate among teachers, students & parents. 
 
 Our objective is to provide an environment that enhances the opportunity for parents & teachers to play a larger role in a child's education. 
 Please remember to select your role as a teacher, student, or parent in your profile.
unfollow_content: When you unfollow you will not get regular updates from the user. However, some of the contents may be visible to you on your feed page Tricycle does not inform that, you have unfollowed them. But you will not be on the users' follower list.
unfollow_user_des: When you unfollow you will not get regular updates for the user. However, some of the contents may be visible to you on your feed page Tricycle does not inform the user that you have unfollowed them. But you will not be on the users' Follower list.
upi_des: Once the invitation details are verified at our end, Rs. 1,000 is transferred to your bank through UPI transfer only.
upload_details: Upload the invitation details of students, staffs and parents.'
upload_image_content2: Being a network for educational purposes, your profile picture is necessary to ensure there is no misuse of the network. Please add your profile picture.
upload_photo_id: To validate your institute, you need to upload your institute ID or any government-issued ID.
user_int_not_registered: Your institute is not yet registered. Register your institute & win upto
verified_Alumni: Only validated alumni are listed here.
verified_buddy: Only verified users can access this
verified_institute: Only validated institutes are listed here.
verified_parent: Only validated parents are listed here.
verified_person: Only validated users and institutes are listed here.
verified_student: Only validated students are listed here.
verified_teachers: Only validated teachers are listed here.
want_exit: Are you sure you want to exit the room?
want_to_invite_child: If you want to invite your child to join Tricycle, please enter phone and/or email ID of your child.
who_want_share: Who do you want to share?
why_report: Why do you want to report this?
work_company_name_mandatory: School, college or company Name is mandatory
write_about_inst: Please write brief about your institution
write_heading_news: Write the heading of news article
write_heading_notice: Write a heading for your notice
are_you_sure_logout: You may not want to stop learning something new. Are you sure you want to logout?
